com.github.CCweixiao.annotation

注释类型 HBaseTable


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface HBaseTable
    该注解用于定义一个HBase的表信息
    作者:
    leo

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      String name
      HBase table name, default value is ""
      String schema
      该表所属的命名空间，默认是default
      String uniqueFamily
      if your HBase table just has one family, you can set a unified family by set the value.

    • 元素详细资料

      • schema

        public abstract String schema
        该表所属的命名空间，默认是default
        返回:
        namespace name
        默认值:
        "default"

      • name

        public abstract String name
        HBase table name, default value is ""
        返回:
        the name of HBase table
        默认值:
        ""

      • uniqueFamily

        public abstract String uniqueFamily
        if your HBase table just has one family, you can set a unified family by set the value.
        返回:
        family name
        默认值:
        ""
